title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not actually do anything. I need to first click on one of the "live" areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
OB: After launching the Help view, pressing the tab key does not cause any action or navigation within the view.
EB: After launching the Help view, pressing the tab key should enable navigation between interactive elements within the view.
SR:
1. Launch the Help view.
2. Press the tab key.
3. Observe that no action or navigation occurs.
4. Click on one of the "live" areas, such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.
5. Press the tab key again.
6. Ensure that navigation between interactive elements within the view is now possible.
